alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WYOMING...CENTRAL CATTARAUGUS... SOUTHEASTERN ERIE...CENTRAL LIVINGSTON...SOUTHERN CHAUTAUQUA... NORTHWESTERN ALLEGANY AND SOUTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caledonia to near Varysburg to near Wattsburg. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. Wind gusts up to 40 mph and hail up to one half inch in diameter will be possible with the strongest storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Geneseo, Letchworth State Park, Le Roy, Springville, Perry, Warsaw, Avon, Lakewood, Mount Morris, Gowanda, Attica, Pavilion, Falconer, Caledonia, Ashford, Arcade, Franklinville, Clymer, and Long Point State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 6 and 9. Interstate 86 between exits 7 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Southern Erie; Wyoming
